name: My Friend, Martha
description:
My Friend, Martha 🌱

Your friend Martha is not doing well, she need constant watering if she wants to survive longer. Unfortunatly, the cactus that share the room with her seem to hate her and keep breaking the pipes. Connect the pipes back together to help Martha !

  Control : Hold left click from the left faucet to the right faucet 

(you can freely trace the path even beyond the tubing and behind martha)

Made for the 8bits time jam ! 

Musics and sounds by the incredible Discourse (with a few sounds from Hazy Lofi Vol 1 - Drum Kit, Morning Coffee Sample Pack and freesound that have been modified)
